headline: Omnicom Announces Strategy and Executive Leadership Following Acquisition of Interpublic
summary: Omnicom (NYSE: OMC), the world's leading marketing and sales company, today unveiled its strategy and executive leadership for the go-forward organization, following the historic completion of its acquisition of Interpublic on November 26, 2025.

raw.headline: Omnicom Announces Strategy and Executive Leadership Following Acquisition of Interpublic

headline: Wpromote acquires Giant Spoon, merging performance, creative proficiencies
summary: By combining skill sets, the resulting agency model hopes to appeal to both CMOs and CFOs at a time of consolidation in the agency space.

raw.headline: Wpromote acquires Giant Spoon, merging performance, creative proficiencies
raw.summary: By combining skill sets, the resulting agency model hopes to appeal to both CMOs and CFOs at a time of consolidation in the agency space.

headline: Omnicom outlines new agency structure as IPG deal sharpens AI, data focus
summary: The newly combined network is built around six capability-based divisions and will retire legacy creative brands MullenLowe, FCB and DDB.

raw.headline: Omnicom outlines new agency structure as IPG deal sharpens AI, data focus
